summary: This bill, the Precision Agriculture Loan Program Act of 2025, amends the Food, Conservation, and Energy Act of 2008 to establish a loan program. This program provides funds to crop and livestock producers for purchasing precision agriculture equipment. The bill defines precision agriculture and eligible equipment. The Secretary of Agriculture will administer the program with loans up to $500,000 for a term of 12 years. The bill also mandates reports detailing loan use, recipient demographics, and environmental impact.
